text: Sprague Grayden (born July 21, 1980) is an American actress. She played schoolteacher Heather Lisinski in the television drama Jericho, Karen Kawalski in John Doe, first daughter Olivia Taylor in the television thriller 24, and Kristi Rey in the movies Paranormal Activity 2 and 3. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Living people
title: Sprague Grayden
